metadata.lrc-note: (11/16/90). Because of the amendment of KRS 138.990 in 1988 Acts ch. 285, sec. 33, the text of subsections (17) and (18) of that statute were reassigned as subsections (14) and (15). Pursuant to KRS 7.136(1), cross-references to those two subsections in this statute have been changed to agree with this renumbering.
